name: Cohere Rerank 最小
description: cohere Rerank API 呼び出し

files.template:
const r = await fetch('https://api.cohere.ai/v1/rerank',{ method:'POST', headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${process.env.COHERE_API_KEY}`,'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ query:'hello', documents:['a','b'] }) });
console.log(await r.json());
